cooler kebocoran/cooler fin tube aman. suban gtc-inlet is titan-130 with solonox combustion system. this unit is equipped with a burner acoustic monitor(bam) system, which monitors turbine combustor dynamic pressure. the system annunciates bam alarms to indicate that combustor dynamic pressure amplitude has exceeded normal levels for a predetermined time. the bam system provides consistent and continuousmonitoring to alert unit operators to intervene and take corrective action to avoid turbine damage. do not opera te the unit in a bam alarm-state for an extended period. operating the unit when combustor dynamic pressure amplitudes exceed normal levels can lead to c ombustor failure. if a bam alarm is annunciated, notify free to ensure that the turbine is safe and for further advice. for any shown bam alarm, notify free and record in log book. note ambient temperature, fuel quality, and turbine contamination can cause an increase in combustor dynamic pressure amplitudes. if a burner acoustic monitor(bam) alarm is shown on the alarm bar, operator intervention is required. note liquid ildup in the bam coil may result in false alarms. notify maintenance personnel to check the bam coil for liquids after any bam system alarms. recommended order for band 0(10-100 hz) problem corrective action: increase turbine speed(ngp) or load to full speed/load. verify bam alarm subsides; if not, decrease turbine speed(ngp) or load to non-solonox mode. verify bam alarm subsides; if not shut down unit. notify free and maintenance personnel to check bam coil for liquids. refer to maintenance procedures in the fuel system chapter in volume ii- maintenance instructions. if liquids are found, restart unit after coil has been drained. verify bam alarm subsides and log and notify free for issue tracking/historycal record. if no liquids are found, notify free immediately and request technical assistance. attach do not operate tags to unit and leave shut down until free and maintenance personnel resolve problem. note for band 00 through band 03, if the pressure is more than one pound square inch root mean square(psi rms) after 10 seconds, a fast stop lockout shutdown
